name: Sucrose
desc: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

battle_talent.normal_desc1: Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing Anemo DMG.
battle_talent.normal_desc2: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time.
battle_talent.normal_desc3: Calling upon the power of her Wind Spirits, Sucrose plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.
battle_talent.element_desc: Creates a small Wind Spirit that pulls opponents and objects towards its location, launches opponents within its AoE, and deals Anemo DMG.
battle_talent.final_desc:
Sucrose hurls an unstable concoction that creates a Large Wind Spirit. While it persists, the Large Wind Spirit will continuously pull and launch nearby opponents, and deal Anemo DMG.
Elemental Absorption: If the Wind Spirit comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

basic_talent.talent1_desc: When Sucrose triggers a Swirl effect, all characters in the party with the matching element (excluding Sucrose) have their Elemental Mastery increased by 50 for 8s.
basic_talent.talent2_desc: When Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 or Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II hits an opponent, increases all party members' (excluding Sucrose) Elemental Mastery based on 20% of Sucrose's Elemental Mastery for 8s.
basic_talent.talent3_desc: When Sucrose crafts Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials, she has a 10% chance to obtain double the product.

sof.sof1_desc: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 gains 1 additional charge.
sof.sof2_desc: The duration of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II is increased by 2s.
sof.sof3_desc:
Increases the Level of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof4_desc: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 1-7s.
sof.sof5_desc:
Increases the Level of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof6_desc: If Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.
